page.title: 17EVENTS IN FYLINGDALES
page.content: country dancing display. This ceremony opens the flower festival in the Church. The annual Robin Hoods Bay Lifeboat Day is held to raise money for the Royal National Lifeboat Institution. A Lifeboat Queen is chosen and dressed in white with a blue ribbon round her waist. She parades round Robin Hoods Bay with her two attendants who wear similar dresses. An Air Sea Rescue Team from Whitby, which consists of one helicopter, an inshore lifeboat and a 44ft. Waveney Lifeboat usually stage a rescue from Gunny Hole. A few fishermen are dropped into the water by a local boat and the helicopter hauls them out and lowers them onto the waiting lifeboat. Fylingthorpe Sports Day is held at the cricket field. The events include flat races, long jump, high jump, fancy
